tags.name: ds-sorter
tags.description: A web component for sorting contained elements

attributes.name: by
attributes.description:
A list of comma-separated rules to sort by in order of precedence.
Specify attributes by name (e.g. "href"). If specifying a property, prepend with "." (e.g. ".innerText").
Optionally, if you'd like to reverse a rule relative to the others, prepend a ">" (e.g. "href, >.innerText").
Finally, if you'd like to get a value of a descendant of the sorted element, wrap a selector in braces before the value and modifiers (e.g. {div label input} .checked).

attributes.name: descending
attributes.description: Sort in descending order (else ascending is default)

properties.name: by
properties.description: A list of rules to sort the elements by. Refer to Rule interface for properties.

properties.name: descending
properties.description: Sort in descending order (else ascending is default)

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Manually trigger a sort, such as in response to an event e.g. <ds-sorter onchange="this.sort()">...</ds-sort>
